price: Isiniif eeyyamameera AdamSoon galaanaafi nyaanni isaas, itti fayyadama keessaniifi daldaltootaatiif jecha. Waan hidhannaa Hajjii keessa jirtanuun adamSoon lafa irraa isin irratti haraama godhame. Rabbii isa gara Isaatti oofamtanu sodaadhaa. {2}
arabic: أُحِلَّ لَكُمۡ صَيۡدُ ٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَطَعَامُهُۥ مَتَٰعٗا لَّكُمۡ وَلِلسَّيَّارَةِۖ وَحُرِّمَ عَلَيۡكُمۡ صَيۡدُ ٱلۡبَرِّ مَا دُمۡتُمۡ حُرُمٗاۗ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ
footnotes: {2} kana jechuun yeroo hajjiifii umraa hidhatan bineensa barraa lafarra jiraatu ajjeesuun dhoowwaadha, garuu waan bishaan keessa jiraatu ajjeesanii nyaachuun hayyamamee jira jechuudha.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: uḥilla lakum ṣaydu al-baḥri waṭaʿāmuhu matāʿan lakum walilssayyārati waḥurrima ʿalaykum ṣaydu al-bari mā dum'tum ḥuruman wa-ittaqū al-laha alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
